summary: This document is an email from Paul Morris to Samantha Harmon discussing a pre-KYC (Know Your Customer) meeting regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates a need to discuss Epstein with colleagues Chip and Pat, highlighting the internal nature of the communication.
